mountaineering.subtitle: A collection of my mountaineering expeditions and alpine adventures around the world
mountaineering.contactForExpedition: Get in touch to discuss expedition planning and mountaineering consulting.

projects.title: Nauhcampatépetl
projects.description: My first solo adventure and ascent was here, at the 'Cofre de Perote'. I would repeat it two more times via different routes.

projects.title: La Malinche
projects.description: Ascent of the Matlalcueye volcano, a classic of Tlaxcala and Puebla, Mexico's sixth-highest peak.

projects.title: Iztaccíhuatl
projects.description: Traverse of the 'Sleeping Woman', Mexico's third-highest peak.

projects.title: Volcancillo
projects.description: Neighboring hill of Cofre de Perote with views of the Veracruz highlands.

projects.title: Sierra Negra
projects.description: Summit of the Sierra Negra volcano, Mexico's fifth-highest peak, home to the Large Millimeter Telescope.

projects.title: Fujisan
projects.description: Ascent of Mount Fuji, Japan's most iconic peak. I summited twice, on two consecutive days.

projects.title: Mulhacén
projects.description: Summit of Mulhacén, the highest in the Iberian Peninsula.

projects.title: Pico Veleta
projects.description: Ascent of Veleta, Sierra Nevada's second-highest summit.

projects.title: Teide
projects.description: Ascent of Teide, the highest peak in Spain.

projects.title: Bobotov Kuk
projects.description: Summit of Bobotov Kuk, Montenegro's highest point.

projects.title: Musala
projects.description: Ascent of Musala, the roof of the Balkans, Bulgaria's highest peak.

projects.title: Zugspitze via Höllental
projects.description: Summit of Zugspitze, Germany's highest point, crossing the Valley of Hell (Höllental), the second-hardest route to reach there.

projects.title: Alpspitze
projects.description: Ascent of Alpspitze, Zugspitze's little sister, from Hammersbach.

projects.title: La Derrumbada Roja
projects.description: Ascent of La Derrumbada Roja, a volcanic dome in Puebla.

projects.title: La Maliciosa
projects.description: My favorite in the Sierra de Guadarrama; I've climbed it multiple times via different routes, including the winter alpine tour through the 'Tubo de Todos'.

projects.title: La Peñota
projects.description: Ascent of La Peñota, a natural balcony of Guadarrama.

projects.title: Abantos
projects.description: Route on Abantos, a viewpoint over San Lorenzo de El Escorial.

projects.title: Mount Parnassus
projects.description: Mountaineering adventure on one of Greece's classic summits.

projects.title: Jubiläumsgrat
projects.description: The classic high-alpine ridge between Zugspitze and Alpspitze, the hardest route to reach Germany's highest point.

projects.title: Hallasan
projects.description: Summit of Hallasan, the highest point in South Korea.

projects.title: Seongsan Ilchulbong
projects.description: Volcanic tuff cone famous for sunrise views.

projects.title: Taal Volcano
projects.description: Active volcano with a crater in Lake Taal.

projects.title: Huangshan
projects.description: Famous for twisted pines, granite peaks, and seas of clouds.

projects.title: Lantau Peak
projects.description: Hong Kong's second-highest summit with views of the Tian Tan Buddha.

projects.title: Wugong Mountain
projects.description: Known for alpine meadows and seas of clouds; dramatic ridge traverses.

projects.title: Qixing Mountain
projects.description: Highest peak in Taipei in Yangmingshan National Park; a dormant volcano with fumaroles.

projects.title: Leiterspitze
projects.description: Alpine summit we did on an idle afternoon in a very quick ascent.

projects.title: Via Ferrata Kühtai
projects.description: High-alpine route with airy/exposed moves; considered difficult, with sections graded D/E.

projects.title: Großer Donnerkogel
projects.description: Ascent via Seeklausalm, bivouacking in the forest and climbing the stairway to heaven, it was a good scramble!

projects.title: Monte Perdido
projects.description: Classic Pyrenees ascent, starting from Ordesa Valley via the Hunter's Trail and Góriz hut. Quite tiring :P

projects.title: Pa de Figa
projects.description: Southern part of Puig Major, maximum elevation of Mallorca island. 300-meter multi-pitch climb.

projects.title: Pico Aneto
projects.description: The highest peak in the Pyrenees and the second-highest in the Iberian Peninsula.

others.subtitle: A modern marketing page built with Material UI and Next.js.
